tool.name: Generate scatter plots
tool.description: for any given markers in FCS file

exit_code.description: Please provide a comma separated list of channels to plot
Please provide numeric values for the list of channels to plot
Please provide more than one channel to plot

param.name: channels
param.label: Markers to plot:
param.help: By default, will plot FSC vs SSC if the channels are found.

param.name: outformat
param.label: Output Format
param.help: PDF will be larger files that may take some time to load.

tool.help:
This tool allows generation of density scatter plots using flowDensity.
-----
**Input files**
This tool takes valid FCS files as input.
**Output files**
This tool generates a scatter plot for each marker combination in a single png file. A pdf file can optionally be generated.
class:: warningmark
PDF are larger files that may take some time to load. It might be faster to download the PDF output once generated to open it locally.
-----
